questions.title: Product Portfolio Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you manage and prioritize across multiple products in a portfolio?
followups: How do you allocate resources across different product lines?
What frameworks help with portfolio-level decision making?

questions.title: Platform Product Management
questions.prompt: What are the unique challenges of managing platform products vs end-user products?
followups: How do you balance the needs of different platform stakeholders?
What metrics are important for platform products?

questions.title: Product-Led Growth Strategy
questions.prompt: Explain product-led growth and how to implement it effectively.
followups: How do you design products for viral growth?
What are the key metrics for product-led growth companies?

questions.title: International Expansion Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you approach international expansion for a product?
followups: How do you decide which markets to enter first?
What are the key considerations for localization?

questions.title: Monetization Strategy for Enterprise Products
questions.prompt: How do you develop pricing and packaging for enterprise SaaS products?
followups: How do you handle enterprise negotiations and custom pricing?
What are common enterprise pricing models and their trade-offs?

questions.title: M&A Integration Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you integrate products and teams after an acquisition?
followups: What are the key risks in product integration after M&A?
How do you prioritize integration work vs ongoing product development?

questions.title: Zero-to-One Product Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you approach building a completely new product category?
followups: What are the unique challenges of creating new markets?
How do you validate demand for a product that doesn't exist yet?

questions.title: Product Organization Design
questions.prompt: How do you structure product teams for maximum effectiveness at scale?
followups: What are the trade-offs between feature teams and platform teams?
How do you evolve team structure as a company grows?

questions.title: Ethical Product Decisions
questions.prompt: How do you navigate ethical dilemmas in product development?
followups: What frameworks help with ethical decision making?
How do you balance business objectives with ethical considerations?

questions.title: Incumbent Disruption Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you position a product against established market leaders?
followups: What are effective strategies for competing with much larger companies?
How do you identify and exploit weaknesses in incumbent products?

questions.title: Product-Led Sales Integration
questions.prompt: How do you align product-led growth with sales-led motion?
followups: How do you design handoffs between self-serve and sales-assisted customers?
What data should sales teams have access to from the product?

questions.title: Regulatory Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you develop products in heavily regulated industries?
followups: How do you balance innovation with compliance requirements?
What's the role of product in regulatory strategy?

questions.title: AI Product Strategy
questions.prompt: What are unique considerations for building AI-powered products?
followups: How do you manage uncertainty in AI model performance?
What ethical considerations are unique to AI products?

questions.title: Product Metrics at Scale
questions.prompt: How do you design and implement a metrics framework for a large, complex product organization?
followups: How do you ensure metric consistency across teams?
What systems are needed to support data-driven decision making at scale?

questions.title: Product Innovation Process
questions.prompt: How do you institutionalize innovation in an established product organization?
followups: How do you balance incremental improvements with breakthrough innovations?
What structures and processes support sustained innovation?
